name: Glug in One Go
description: A two-seater fabric sofa shaped like a gaping fish.\nAccording to those who've tried it, this sofa perfectly captures the surreal sensation of sitting inside a fish's mouth while reassuring the guests that they won't actually be glugged down in one go. As for how anyone would know "what it feels like to sit in a fish's mouth" or "under what conditions a fish might swallow you whole"... that is a matter best directed to Nod-Krai's Fishing Association and the classic case studies in their "Angler's Safety Guidelines"...
